source.name: USA Spending Grants and Loans
source.description: Provides US Federal Spending by agency. The Grants section allows visitors to search for information about federal assistance; including grants, insurance, direct payments, and other. Information about federal loan spending can be found on the Loans section, which allows visitors to search for information about different federal loan categories, including Direct Loans and Guaranteed Loans.
